mapper.select: select a.club_num,a.club_name,b.perform,b.manner from (select club_num, club_name from club where club_num=#{home} or club_num=#{away} ) a left outer join (select club_num, avg(perform) as perform, avg(manner) as manner from club_rating group by club_num) b on a.club_num=b.club_num

select a.club_num,a.id,a.nickname,a.thumbnail_image,a.profile_image,b.status from (select * from match_vote where club_num=#{club_num} and match_num=#{match_num})b right outer join (select c.club_num club_num,c.id,m.nickname,m.thumbnail_image,m.profile_image from member_detail m join club_join c on m.id=c.id where c.club_num=#{club_num}) a on b.id=a.id

select * from (select * from (select * from match where match_date>sysdate-1 and away='모집중')a join club b on a.home=b.club_num) d join (select avg(manner),avg(perform),club_num from club_rating group by club_num) e on d.club_num=e.club_num
